title: Remove OMP_NUM_THREADS and MKL_NUM_THREADS settings from docker images
body_html: OMP_NUM_THREADS and MKL_NUM_THREADS are set to 4 by default in the docker images, which causes nproc to only show 4 cores in the docker containers by default, and building PyTorch is slow in this default case. We likely don't need these two flags to be set, and this PR tests that hypothesis.
body_text: OMP_NUM_THREADS and MKL_NUM_THREADS are set to 4 by default in the docker images, which causes nproc to only show 4 cores in the docker containers by default, and building PyTorch is slow in this default case. We likely don't need these two flags to be set, and this PR tests that hypothesis.
body: `OMP_NUM_THREADS` and `MKL_NUM_THREADS` are set to 4 by default in the docker images, which causes `nproc` to only show 4 cores in the docker containers by default, and building PyTorch is slow in this default case. We likely don't need these two flags to be set, and this PR tests that hypothesis.
